channel.title: Flutter on Hack It Up
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter on Hack It Up

item.title: Flutter Webview Application
item.description: Flutter Webview app for a mobile optimized webpage Motivation My website was built for mobile. It works just fine on a mobile browser. But now I wanted to have an app for the same. Though I had fairly good android development experience, but it was quite sometime ago. And also, lately I had been swarmed with articles about flutter and its usage. So it was time for me to build something with flutter.
